translations: n.罪犯（offender 的复数）；冒犯者

sentences.sentence: The offenders lapsed into a sullen silence.
sentences.translation: 这些罪犯陷入了愤懑的沉默。

sentences.sentence: Offenders are liable to fines of up to $500.
sentences.translation: 违者可能被处以最多500元的罚款。

sentences.sentence: You yourself are one of the chief offenders.
